医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
英格兰的青少年肥胖在15年中增长了50％在今年的欧洲肥胖大会（ECO 2025，西班牙马拉加，5月11日至14日）上进行的新研究表明，从2008-2010（22％）到2021-2023（33％），英格兰超重或肥胖的青少年比例增加了50％。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250412/Adolescent-Obesity-ibesity-in-england-rises-by-5025-15--15-年度aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250412/Adolescent-Obesity-ibesity-in-england-rises-rises-by-5025-15-coms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1801569b-1f4d-4ebf-b93c-b93c-f3081fab43e9 Sat, 12 Apr 2025 23:59:00 -0400 Adolescent obesity in England rises by 50% over 15 years
新研究将寄生疾病与宫颈内膜的遗传变化联系起来新的研究表明，血吸虫血吸虫病（嗜血杆菌）是一种影响全球数百万人的寄生虫感染，可以触发与癌症相关的基因活性在宫颈内膜中，治疗后变化变得更加明显。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250412/new-study-connects-parasitic-disease-to-genetic-disease-to-genetic-changes-changes in-the-the-the-cervical-linin.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250412/new-study-connects-parasitic-disease-disease-to-genetic-to-genetic-changes-changes-changes-cline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3E964A5D-E497-43E9-A266-A266-5CB5A2CF45F4 Sat, 12 Apr 2025 23:56:00 -0400 New study connects parasitic disease to genetic changes in the cervical lining
研究：2022年因耐药感染而死亡的300万儿童死亡今天在Escmid Global 2025的一项具有里程碑意义的研究表明，由于抗菌素抵抗（AMR）相关的感染，全球超过300万儿童在2022年丧生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250412/study-over-3-mill-children-children-died-in-2022-due-to-to-drug-drug-enfectant-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250412/study-over-3-mill-children-died-in-died-in-2022-due-to-to-drug-comistant-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3854cd4d-743f-4f62-4f62-8c86-769783aad462 Sat, 12 Apr 2025 23:44:04 -0400 Study: Over 3 million children died in 2022 due to drug-resistant infections
心理学家探索与人类关系相关的道德问题人们与人工智能（AI）技术建立亲密的长期关系变得越来越普遍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/psychologists-explore-ectlore-ethical-essues-issues-sassived-with-with-human-ai-realationss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/psychologists-explore-eclore-ectilical-essues-issues-issues-sassived-with-with-human-ai-relationships.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4371b6a-0c5f-4C8B-B19B-B19B-3E1EB3505BB7 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 23:06:45 -0400 Psychologists explore ethical issues associated with human-AI relationships
疟疾寄生虫的遗传多样性挑战一种适合所有策略尽管数十年来的努力集中在消除蚊子，药物疗法和疫苗上，但疟疾仍然很难击败，尤其是在非洲。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/genetic-diversity-of-malaria-parasite-parasite-challenges-one-size-size-fits-all-strategies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/genetic-diversity-of-malaria-parasite-parasite-challenges-one-size-size-fits-fits-all-strategies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B554ED81-4944-4C2C-BA83-EF17CB781972 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 22:47:00 -0400 Genetic diversity of malaria parasite challenges one size fits all strategies
与RSV相关的感染与成年人一年死亡率有关今天在ESCMID Global 2025提出的一项重大研究表明，与普通人群相比，患有呼吸道合胞病毒相关的急性急性呼吸道感染（RSV-ARI）的成年人在一年内面临2.7倍的死亡风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/rsv-assv-sassivions-infections-ninked-to-to-to-to-higher-one-nar-mortality-in-Adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/rsv-assv-sassivions-infections-in-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-nigh-mortality-in-mortality-in-aidults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7Ac899ee-6342-4da7-bec0-7070705f2ca771 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 22:41:00 -0400 RSV-associated infections linked to higher one year mortality in adults
IL-6在高风险组中作为早期败血症指标出现今天在Escmid Global 2025提出的一项开创性研究发现了白介素6（IL-6）作为一种有力的诊断生物标志物，用于早期在高危患者群体中早期发现败血症，包括新生儿，儿童和孕妇。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/il-6-emerges-as-as-early-sepsis-indicator-in--ing----------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/il-6-emerges-as-as-early-sepsis-indicator-in-ing--in---------------------- #comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ffd790b-700b-700b-4c1a-b7da-e60bfd6ac2d0 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 22:38:00 -0400 IL-6 emerges as early sepsis indicator in high risk groups
Surmount-1试验发现Tirzepatide支持长期体重控制将在今年的欧洲肥胖大会（ECO 2025，马拉加，西班牙，5月11日至14日）上进行的新研究表明，在开始使用Tirzepatide治疗三年后，大约三分之二的Marmount-1试验参与者仅恢复了其所谓的Nadir（或最低体重）的5％或更少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/surmount-1-trial-finds-finds-tirzepatide-supports-long-term-term-weight-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/surmount-1-trial-finds-finds-tirzepatide-supports-long--term-term-weight-weight-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28964311-41A7-49C7-49C7-AF0F-7FA95F86FFBA Fri, 11 Apr 2025 22:19:00 -0400 SURMOUNT-1 trial finds tirzepatide supports long term weight control
儿童的脸可能会揭示隐藏的性别偏见最近发表在性行为档案中的新研究表明，儿童的性别偏见可以反映在其面部情感表达中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/childrens-faces-may-reveal-hidden-gender-bias.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/childrens-faces-may-reveal-hidden-hidden-gender-bias.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=359337BC-8679-4D7A-9F48-F48-F2A7EBBFA191 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 22:12:59 -0400 Children's faces may reveal hidden gender bias
西北科学家确定了帕金森发展背后的关键基因帕金森氏病研究的一个长期谜团就是为什么一些携带病原变异的人会增加其PD风险，而其他携带这种变体的人则没有。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/northwestern-scientists-indistify-nistify-key-genes-behind-behind-parkinsons-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/northwestern-scientists-scientists-indistify-nistify-nistify-beenes-behind-parkinsons-parkinsons-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2A909559-0E9D-4CFC-BAA9-0B47AA622E67 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 22:08:47 -0400 Northwestern scientists identify key genes behind Parkinson's development
